title: The Foolishness of Zohran Mamdani
body: Satmar community members endorse Muslim socialist Zohran Mamdani, claiming he's "not anti-Jewish" but "anti-Israel." However, his support for globalizing anti-Israel chants contradicts this claim, sparking concerns about the dishonesty and danger of this argument.

title: Agudah National Action Summit
body: Agudath Israel of America hosts the Agudah National Action Summit at the Newark Marriott Hotel, December 1-2, 2025, drawing community leaders, rabbanim, educators, askanim, and professionals for a two-day gathering.
